title: FINAL BONDAGE ACTRESS: HYPER-REALISTIC HORROR HOTEL
description: "It wasn't Hollywood, yet, but it was her Highest Paying Gig as a B Horror Movie Actress . . . this one was different . . . it was like a Live Stage Show of Scenes from Horror Movies . . .The other Scenes and Actors she witnessed on her way to her spot were very realistic . . . but her years of experience kept telling her how they did it . . . how Fake it all really was . . .Looking forward to meeting and working with her Handler Ken was a Joy. His costume of a Butcher with a bloody chain covered club was a little over the Top . . . but that's B Horror for you . . . Once he helped her into her chair for the Day . . . things got Real . . .Turns out, the only Fake parts in the Horror Hotel were the ones in her mind . . . figuring this out all too late, seals her Fate . . .""As an Addition to My Planned "Hyper-Realistic Horror Hotel", things get a littler Darker and Bloodier then Normal . . . I like to see this Series as part of my 'Zatanna Xtra Dark' Stories. My Goal, with your Approval, is to share more about the Horror Hotel and its un-willing Customers, every few weeks . . ."Love Zatanna . . . Xtra Dark ; ) Contains Scenes of, but not limited to - Prolonged Bondage, BDSM, Distress, Torture, Sensory Deprivation, Blood . . . Lots of Blood, Possible Hanging, Strangulation, Suffocation . . . Oh, and shrimp scampi and garlic buttered noodles with a hint of oregano ; )
author: Zatanna Dark
